DOC.brief_summary: Prospective observational ultrasound study native arterio-venous fistula haemodialysis venous pressure measurement use control compression ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: Colour Coded Duplex Ultrasound Native Arterio-venous Fistula Haemodialysis With Venous Pressure Measurement Using Controlled Compression Ultrasound Predictor Shunt Maturation Early Postoperative Phase
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients creation native arteriovenous fistula cephalic vein hemodialysis access ; Informed consent . Exclusion criterion : Former creation native arteriovenous fistula arm ; Known upper extremity occlusive arterial disease ; Situation ultrasound examination suitable : extreme swell arm , postoperative pain , hematoma , local infection .
